options.content:
## Metrics collected from IBM Power HMC
    
For more information: [bitbucket.org/mnellemann/hmci](https://bitbucket.org/mnellemann/hmci)

targets.query: SELECT last("weight") AS "Weight", last("mode") AS "Mode", last("entitledProcUnits") AS "eCPU",  (last("utilizedProcUnits") / last("entitledProcUnits")) * 100 AS "Utilization eCPU", last("currentVirtualProcessors") AS "vCPU", (last("utilizedProcUnits") / last("maxProcUnits")) * 100 AS "Utilization vCPU"  FROM "lpar_processor" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/) AND ("lparname" =~ /^$LPAR$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "lparname" fill(previous)

SELECT last("id") AS "ID", last("state") as "State", last("osType") as "OS Type", last("affinityScore") as "Affinity Score" FROM "lpar_details" WHERE ("lparname" =~ /^$LPAR$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "lparname"  fill(previous)

SELECT (mean("utilizedProcUnits") / mean("maxProcUnits")) * 100 AS "usage" FROM "lpar_processor" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/ AND "lparname" =~ /^$LPAR$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "lparname", "servername" fill(linear)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "PartitionVirtualFiberChannelAdapters" WHERE ("system" =~ /^$ManagedSystem$/ AND "name" != 'transmittedBytes' AND "partition" =~ /^$Partition$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "wwpn", "partition", "name" fill(null)

panels.title: Virtual Fiber Channel Adapters - Read Bytes

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "PartitionVirtualFiberChannelAdapters" WHERE ("system" =~ /^$ManagedSystem$/ AND "name" != 'transmittedBytes' AND "partition" =~ /^$Partition$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "wwpn", "partition", "name" fill(null)

panels.title: Virtual Fiber Channel Adapters - Write Bytes

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "PartitionVirtualFiberChannelAdapters" WHERE ("system" =~ /^$ManagedSystem$/ AND "name" != 'transmittedBytes' AND "partition" =~ /^$Partition$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "wwpn", "partition", "name" fill(null)
SELECT mean("writeBytes") FROM "lpar_storage_vFC" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/ AND "lparname" =~ /^$LparName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "lparname"
SELECT mean("writeBytes") FROM "lpar_storage_virtual" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/ AND "lparname" =~ /^$LparName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "lparname"
SELECT mean("writeBytes") FROM "lpar_storage_virtual" WHERE ("servername" =~ /^$ServerName$/ AND "lparname" =~ /^$LparName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "lparname"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "server_processor" WITH KEY = "servername" WHERE time > now() - 24h
list.label: Server Name
list.name: ServerName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "server_processor" WITH KEY = "servername" WHERE time > now() - 24h

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lpar_processor" WITH KEY = "lparname" WHERE servername =~ /$ServerName/
list.label: Logical Partition
list.name: LPAR
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lpar_processor" WITH KEY = "lparname" WHERE servername =~ /$ServerName/
